key.name: window-maximize
key.description: True if the application window is maximized, false otherwise.

key.name: window-width
key.description: The last recorded width of the application window.

key.name: window-height
key.description: The last recorded height of the application window.

key.name: formatting-toolbar-visible
key.description: True if the formatting toolbar in the composer is shown.

key.name: autoselect
key.description: True if we should autoselect the next available conversation.

key.name: display-preview
key.description: True if we should display a short preview of each message.

key.name: single-key-shortcuts
key.description: Enables shortcuts for email actions that do not require pressing <Ctrl> to emulate those used by Gmail.

key.name: spell-check-languages
key.summary: Languages that shall be used in the spell checker
key.description: A list of POSIX locales, with the empty list disabling spell checking and the null list using desktop languages by default.

key.name: spell-check-visible-languages
key.summary: Languages that are displayed in the spell checker popover
key.description: List of languages that are always displayed in the popover of the spell checker.

key.name: startup-notifications
key.summary: Notify of new mail at startup
key.description: True to notify of new mail at startup.

key.name: ask-open-attachment
key.description: True to ask when opening an attachment.

key.name: compose-as-html
key.summary: Whether to compose emails in HTML
key.description: True to compose emails in HTML; false for plain text.

key.name: conversation-viewer-zoom
key.description: The zoom to apply on the conservation view.

key.name: composer-window-size
key.description: The last recorded size of the detached composer window.

key.name: undo-send-delay
key.description: The number of seconds to wait before sending an email. Set to zero or less to disable.

key.name: brief-notification-duration
key.description: The length of time in seconds for which brief notifications should be displayed.

key.name: optional-plugins
key.description: Plugins listed here will be loaded on startup.

key.name: migrated-config
key.summary: Whether we migrated the old settings
key.description: False to check for the old “org.yorba.geary”-schema and copy its values.
